Sql.CDATA:
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.AFResultSplit', 'V') IS NOT NULL DROP VIEW [dbo].[AFResultSplit] GO
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[AFResultSplit] AS SELECT P10.ResultID, P10.ResultTstamp, P10.CompanyID, P10.ResultP10 AS Forecast, 'low' AS ValueType FROM dbo.AFResult AS P10 UNION SELECT E50.ResultID, E50.ResultTstamp, E50.CompanyID, E50.ResultP10 AS Forecast, 'mid' AS ValueType FROM dbo.AFResult AS E50 UNION SELECT P90.ResultID, P90.ResultTstamp, P90.CompanyID, P90.ResultP10 AS Forecast, 'high' AS ValueType FROM dbo.AFResult AS P90
